subject: Economy
question_en: What was the Gross Domestic Product (GDP) of India in 2019-2020?
question_hi: 2019-2020 में भारत का ग्रॉस डोमेंट प्रॉप (GDP) क्या था?
explanation_en: The Gross Domestic Product (GDP) of India in the financial year 2019-2020 was Rs. 280,000 crore. (Source: Ministry of Statistics and Programme Implementation)
